Line11.6D03F: The Wanderer’s connection to her gave me hope. (chuckle) Imagine that.
Line13.6D03F: Or some greater power pulling the strings? I did not know.
Line9.6D03F: But at the time, I thought I had a chance to protect humanity from the Daughter of Hatred.
Line7.6D03F: Different lives and incidents drawn together...by what? Destiny?
Line5.6D03F: The Wanderer lost in the storm. Fed the blood of Lilith. Saved by a lone monk.
Line3.6D03F: Whether it is by accident or fate’s hand, there is nothing we can do about it.
Line1.6D03F: Sometimes our paths in life are set to collide, we just don’t know it.
